tool_description: Verifies vendor adherence to regulatory requirements, legal obligations, and procurement policy compliance across multiple jurisdictions.

procurement_category.description: Category of goods/services the vendor provides

check_sanctions.description: Whether to check against sanctions lists

error_messages: Registration not found: The provided registration_id does not exist in the system.
Unsupported jurisdiction: The specified jurisdiction is not supported for compliance checking.
Invalid procurement category: Provide a valid category from the government procurement classification.
Sanctions list unavailable: Unable to access current sanctions databases for verification.
usage: Provide registration_id, jurisdiction, and procurement_category to perform compliance verification. Optionally disable sanctions checking if not required.

required_actions.description: Actions required to achieve full compliance
